Key Match Events: Dereck Lively II recorded his second double-double for the 2024-25 Mavs with 11 points, 11 boards, and one dime
Kyrie Irving played a sizeable role in the Mavericks improving to 4-2 this season via the win over the Magic
Pre-Game Insights: Paolo Banchero is out indefinitely with a torn right oblique
Wendell Carter Jr. played only nine minutes in Sunday night's 108-85 road loss to the Mavericks before exiting with a left foot injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dallas Mavericks and Orlando Magic boast two Duke basketball products apiece
Dallas hosts the Indiana Pacers (2-4) at 9:45 p.m. ET Monday
